attributes.action: excuse the people of the United States for having a President with absolutely no class
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please accept our apologies for the arrogant and thoughtless actions of the sitting president, Barack Hussein Obama. His obvious lack of class and disdain for the UK is NOT representative of the feelings of the PEOPLE of the United States. We greatly value the relationship with our closest ally and apologize for any offense.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
